item.title: 上海犹太难民历史成为新清唱剧的中心舞台
item.description:
Four years after it was first conceived, the oratorio Emigre made its debut this month in Shanghai, paying tribute to the Chinese financial hub's war-time role in protecting European Jewish refugees who fled to the city in the late 1930s.翻译:清唱剧《流亡者》首次构思四年后，于本月在上海首演，向中国金融中心在战时保护 1930 年代末逃往该市的欧洲犹太难民方面所发挥的作用致敬。

A collaboration between the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, New York Philharmonic as well as choirs from the U.S. and China, the work premiered on Nov. 17.翻译:该作品由上海交响乐团、纽约爱乐乐团以及中美合唱团合作，于11月17日首演。

Composer Aaron Zigman, known best for his movie scores, said he was approached by Shanghai Symphony Orchestra's maestro Long Yu in 2019 with the idea for a piece telling the story of Shanghai's Jewish refugee history.翻译:以电影配乐而闻名的作曲家亚伦·齐格曼表示，2019 年，上海交响乐团指挥大师余隆找到他，提出创作一部讲述上海犹太难民历史故事的作品的想法。

"This is a story about two German Jewish brothers who had to flee Nazi Germany, and they came to Shanghai, which at that time opened its doors to many Jews," Zigman said.翻译:“这是一个关于两个德国犹太兄弟不得不逃离纳粹德国，来到上海的故事，当时上海向许多犹太人敞开了大门，”齐格曼说。

"It's really a multicultural love story at the end of the day, and then a story of humanity, love, hope and acceptance through the tragedy of loss as well."翻译:“归根结底，这确实是一个多元文化的爱情故事，也是一个在失去亲人的悲剧中讲述人性、爱、希望和接受的故事。”

In the late 1930s, as World War Two was about to break out, Shanghai was one of the few places in the world open to Jewish refugees, as many countries restricted visa access. As an "open port" a visa wasn't required for those arriving in Shanghai, mainly by boat, from Europe.翻译:20世纪30年代末，第二次世界大战即将爆发，上海是世界上少数向犹太难民开放的地方之一，因为许多国家限制签证。作为一个“开放港口”，那些主要从欧洲乘船抵达上海的人不需要签证。

An estimated 20,000 European Jews would escape to Shanghai throughout this period, though their new home was not without strife. China was also at war, with Japan, and Shanghai was occupied by Japanese forces from 1937.翻译:在此期间，估计有 20,000 名欧洲犹太人逃往上海，尽管他们的新家并非没有发生冲突。中国也与日本交战，上海从 1937 年起被日本军队占领。

Mark Campbell, the Pulitzer Prize-winning librettist behind the lyrics for Emigre said he felt the story was "special and important" to tell now, in view of the conflict between Israel and Hamas in Gaza, as well as the war in Ukraine.翻译:普利策奖得主、《移民》歌词作者马克·坎贝尔表示，考虑到以色列和哈马斯在加沙的冲突以及乌克兰的战争，他觉得现在讲述这个故事“特别且重要”。

"I believe that the message of accepting refugees, of accepting people and welcoming them, is resonating even more now," he added.翻译:他补充说：“我相信，接受难民、接受人们并欢迎他们的信息现在更能引起共鸣。”

Chen Jian, curator of the Shanghai Jewish Refugees Museum, was in the audience for Emigre's global premiere at the Jaguar Shanghai Symphony Orchestra Hall in downtown Shanghai.翻译:上海犹太难民博物馆馆长陈健在上海市中心的捷豹上海交响乐团音乐厅观看了《移民》全球首演。

"I think this kind of creation is very meaningful and valuable," he told Reuters before the performance. "In mankind's darkest times, we need kind hearts and good deeds. This story should have an educational effect on how we look at disputes in the world today."翻译:“我认为这种创作非常有意义和有价值，”他在演出前告诉路透社。 “在人类最黑暗的时期，我们需要善良的心和善行。这个故事应该对我们如何看待当今世界的争端产生教育作用。”

The work, sung in English with Chinese supertitles, ran in Shanghai through Nov. 20. It is scheduled to be performed in New York early next year.翻译:这部作品以英文演唱，配有中文字幕，于 11 月 20 日在上海演出。预计明年初在纽约演出。

Reporting by Casey Hall; Editing by Sonali Paul翻译:凯西·霍尔报道；索纳利·保罗编辑

item.title: 独家：法国和美国将在 COP28 会议上提议禁止向燃煤电厂提供私人融资 - 消息人士
item.description:
France, backed by the United States, plans to seek a halt to private financing for coal-based power plants during the U.N. climate conference later this month, three sources familiar with the deliberations told Reuters in India and Europe.翻译:印度和欧洲的三名知情人士告诉路透社，在美国的支持下，法国计划在本月晚些时候的联合国气候会议期间寻求停止对燃煤电厂的私人融资。

The plan, which was communicated to India earlier this month, will deepen divisions at the COP28 summit in Dubai running from Nov. 30 to Dec. 12, with India and China opposed to any attempt to block construction of coal-fired power stations for their energy-hungry economies.翻译:该计划于本月早些时候传达给印度，将加深 11 月 30 日至 12 月 12 日在迪拜举行的 COP28 峰会上的分歧，印度和中国反对任何阻止本国燃煤发电站建设的企图。能源匮乏的经济体。

France's minister of state for development Chrysoula Zacharopoulou told the Indian government about the plan, called the "New Coal Exclusion Policy", for private financial institutions and insurance companies, two Indian officials said.翻译:两名印度官员称，法国发展国务部长 Chrysoula Zacharopoulou 向印度政府介绍了针对私人金融机构和保险公司的“新煤炭排除政策”计划。

The plan to stop private financing for coal-fired power plants has not been previously reported.翻译:此前并未报道过停止私人融资燃煤电厂的计划。

A spokesman for Zacharopoulou did not directly comment on emailed queries from Reuters but said the question of financial investments in coal had been discussed at several different multilateral forums over the past few years.翻译:扎查罗普卢的发言人没有直接对路透社通过电子邮件发出的询问发表评论，但表示过去几年在多个不同的多边论坛上讨论了煤炭金融投资问题。

India's environment, power and renewable energy, coal, external affairs and information ministries, the OECD and the French embassy in New Delhi did not respond to Reuters' requests for comment.翻译:印度环境、电力和可再生能源、煤炭、外交部和信息部、经合组织和法国驻新德里大使馆没有回应路透社的置评请求。

A source in Europe familiar with the plan said the aim was to dry up private funding for coal power and that it was a top priority for French President Emmanuel Macron during COP28, seen as a crucial opportunity to accelerate action to limit global warming.翻译:一位熟悉该计划的欧洲消息人士表示，该计划的目的是减少对煤电的私人融资，这是法国总统马克龙在 COP28 期间的首要任务，被视为加快采取行动限制全球变暖的重要机会。

The proposal provides for the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) to set coal-exit standards for private finance firms whose financing could be tracked by regulators, rating agencies and non-governmental organisations, the two Indian officials said.翻译:两位印度官员表示，该提案规定经济合作与发展组织（OECD）为私人金融公司制定煤炭退出标准，监管机构、评级机构和非政府组织可以跟踪这些公司的融资情况。

The U.S., European Union and Canada, among others, have been seeking a plan to expedite the phase-out of coal, which they have cited as the "number one threat" to climate goals.翻译:美国、欧盟和加拿大等国一直在寻求一项加速淘汰煤炭的计划，他们称煤炭是气候目标的“头号威胁”。

They are concerned private international financing continues to support large additions to coal capacity in developing nations, according to the plan shared by France with India.翻译:他们担心，根据法国与印度共享的计划，国际私人融资继续支持发展中国家大量增加煤炭产能。

Some 490 gigawatts of new coal capacity, roughly equal to one-fifth of existing global capacity, is planned or under construction, mostly in India and China, the officials said.翻译:官员们表示，计划或在建的新增煤炭产能约为 490 吉瓦，大约相当于全球现有产能的五分之一，其中大部分位于印度和中国。

Rick Duke, Deputy U.S. Special Envoy on Climate Change, did not comment directly on the proposal but noted the expansion in coal-fired plants.翻译:美国气候变化副特使里克·杜克没有直接评论该提案，但指出了燃煤电厂的扩张。

"We are pushing to set an expectation globally that countries need to join us in the fastest possible power sector transition, including all that clean power deployment," Duke said.翻译:杜克表示：“我们正在努力在全球范围内树立一种期望，即各国需要与我们一起以最快的速度实现电力行业转型，包括所有清洁能源的部署。”

"And countries need to stop digging a deeper hole by building new unabated coal power plants, because unfortunately, there's still some 500 gigawatts of new coal-fired power plants in the pipeline globally, and the IPCC and the International Energy Agency have both been quite clear that that needed to stop already."翻译:“各国需要停止通过建设新的、未曾减弱的燃煤电厂来挖更深的坑，因为不幸的是，全球仍有约 500 吉瓦的新燃煤电厂正在建设中，而 IPCC 和国际能源署都已经相当显然，这种情况需要立即停止。”

Member countries are divided on emissions abatement technologies that are yet to evolve to commercial scale for use in developing countries, one of the Indian officials said.翻译:一位印度官员表示，成员国在减排技术上存在分歧，这些技术尚未发展到在发展中国家使用的商业规模。

About 73% of electricity consumed in India is produced using coal, even though the country has increased its non-fossil capacity to 44% of its total installed power generation capacity.翻译:印度约 73% 的电力消耗是用煤炭生产的，尽管该国已将非化石能源发电量增加到总装机容量的 44%。

The country intends to resist the push to fix a deadline for a fossil fuel phase-out or phase-down at COP28, as coal will be its main energy source for a few more decades, and may ask members to shift their focus on reducing emissions from other sources. It may also push developed nations to become carbon negative rather than carbon neutral by 2050.翻译:该国打算抵制在 COP28 上确定逐步淘汰或逐步减少化石燃料最后期限的推动，因为煤炭将在未来几十年内成为其主要能源，并可能要求成员国将重点转向减少排放来自其他来源。它还可能推动发达国家到 2050 年实现碳负排放而不是碳中和。

Reporting by Sarita Chaganti Singh, Valerie Volcovici in Washington and Kate Abnett in Brussels; Additional reporting by Benjamin Mallet in Paris; Editing by Sonali Paul翻译:Sarita Chaganti Singh、Valerie Volcovici（华盛顿）和 Kate Abnett（布鲁塞尔）报道；本杰明·马莱特 (Benjamin Mallet) 在巴黎的补充报道；索纳利·保罗编辑

item.title: Stellantis与宁德时代签署欧洲磷酸铁锂电池供应初步协议，考虑合资
item.description:
Carmaker Stellantis (STLAM.MI) and Chinese EV battery giant CATL (300750.SZ) said on Tuesday they signed a preliminary agreement for the supply of battery cells and modules for the automaker's electric vehicle (EV) production in Europe.翻译:汽车制造商Stellantis (STLAM.MI)和中国电动汽车电池巨头CATL (300750.SZ)周二表示，他们签署了一份初步协议，为该汽车制造商在欧洲的电动汽车(EV)生产供应电池和模块。

The two companies said in a joint statement they were also considering a possible investment to set up a 50-50 joint venture to support the automakers' electrification strategy.翻译:两家公司在一份联合声明中表示，他们还在考虑可能投资建立一家 50:50 的合资企业，以支持汽车制造商的电气化战略。

Based on the agreement, for which financial details were not provided, CATL will supply lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries to the Franco-Italian automaker, owner of brands including Jeep, Peugeot, Fiat and Alfa Romeo.翻译:根据该协议（未提供财务细节），宁德时代将向这家法意汽车制造商供应磷酸铁锂（LFP）电池，该公司拥有吉普、标致、菲亚特和阿尔法罗密欧等品牌。

LFP batteries will allow Stellantis to offer high-quality, durable and affordable EVs in the passenger car, crossover and small and medium sized SUV segments, they said.翻译:他们表示，磷酸铁锂电池将使 Stellantis 能够在乘用车、跨界车和中小型 SUV 领域提供高质量、耐用且价格实惠的电动汽车。

Stellantis and CATL said the memorandum of understanding (MoU) announced on Tuesday outlined a long-term collaboration between the two groups, including "identifying opportunities to further strengthen the battery value chain".翻译:Stellantis 和 CATL 表示，周二宣布的谅解备忘录 (MoU) 概述了两个集团之间的长期合作，包括“寻找进一步加强电池价值链的机会”。

"We believe the partnership will be a decisive step on both parties' journey towards carbon neutrality goals," CATL Chairman and General Manager Robin Zeng said.翻译:宁德时代董事长兼总经理曾罗宾表示：“我们相信，此次合作将成为双方实现碳中和目标的决定性一步。”

Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares said the MoU on LFP battery chemistry was "another ingredient in our long-term strategy to protect freedom of mobility for the European middle class".翻译:Stellantis首席执行官卡洛斯·塔瓦雷斯(Carlos Tavares)表示，关于磷酸铁锂电池化学的谅解备忘录是“我们保护欧洲中产阶级出行自由的长期战略的另一个组成部分”。

For its EV battery needs in Europe Stellantis is building three gigafactories, in France, Germany and Italy through its ACC joint venture with Mercedes (MBGn.DE) and TotalEnergies (TTEF.PA), while others might follow in the region. Since its creation in early 2021 through the merger of Fiat Chrysler and Peugeot maker PSA, it has lined up several supply agreements for materials needed for its global EV production.翻译:为了满足欧洲的电动汽车电池需求，Stellantis 正在通过其与梅赛德斯(MBGn.DE)和 TotalEnergies (TTEF.PA)成立的 ACC 合资企业，在法国、德国和意大利建设三个超级工厂，而其他公司也可能会在该地区效仿。自 2021 年初通过菲亚特克莱斯勒和标致制造商 PSA 合并成立以来，该公司已就其全球电动汽车生产所需的材料达成了多项供应协议。

Reporting by Giulio Piovaccari; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama翻译:朱利奥·皮奥瓦卡里报道；编辑：野宫千津

item.title: 麦当劳看好中国增长前景，增持本地业务
item.description:
McDonald's (MCD.N) said it had struck a deal to ramp up its stake in its China business to just under 50%, expressing confidence in the burger chain's growth prospects in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:麦当劳(MCD.N)表示，已达成协议，将其在中国业务的股份增至略低于 50%，表达了对该汉堡连锁店在全球第二大经济体的增长前景的信心。

The move contrasts sharply with the prevailing trend of multinational corporations reeling back investments in China or even exiting the market altogether due to geopolitical and economic challenges.翻译:此举与跨国公司因地缘政治和经济挑战而减少在华投资甚至完全退出市场的普遍趋势形成鲜明对比。

The deal to acquire investment firm Carlyle's (CG.O) 28% holding in the burger chain's China business, which also includes its stores in Hong Kong and Macau, will see McDonald's stake rise to 48%. A consortium led by state-backed conglomerate CITIC (0267.HK) has controlling ownership with a 52% stake.翻译:通过收购投资公司凯雷(CG.O)持有的这家汉堡连锁店中国业务（其中还包括其在香港和澳门的门店）28% 的股份，麦当劳的持股比例将增至 48%。由国有企业中信集团（0267.HK）牵头的财团拥有控股权，持有 52% 的股份。

"We believe there is no better time to simplify our structure, given the tremendous opportunity to capture increased demand and further benefit from our fastest growing market's long-term potential," McDonald's CEO Chris Kempczinski said in a statement on Monday.翻译:麦当劳首席执行官克里斯·肯普钦斯基(Chris Kempczinski)周一在一份声明中表示：“我们相信，现在是简化我们结构的最佳时机，因为我们有巨大的机会抓住不断增长的需求，并从我们增长最快的市场的长期潜力中进一步受益。”

Financial terms were not disclosed but two people with knowledge of the transaction said the deal values the China unit at around $6 billion.翻译:财务条款并未披露，但两位知情人士表示，该交易对中国业务的估值约为 60 亿美元。

That is far more than its valuation in 2017 when McDonald's agreed to sell 80% of the business to CITIC, its investment arm CITIC Capital - now known as Trustar Capital - and Carlyle for up to $2.1 billion. At the time, the U.S. firm had wanted to pursue rapid expansion without using much of its own capital.翻译:这远远高于其 2017 年的估值，当时麦当劳同意以高达 21 亿美元的价格将 80% 的业务出售给中信集团、其投资部门中信资本（现称为 Trustar Capital）和凯雷集团。当时，这家美国公司希望在不使用大量自有资本的情况下实现快速扩张。

It is, however, less than the valuation of up to $10 billion that Carlyle and Trustar had at one point been seeking as part of efforts to establish a so-called continuation fund, different sources have previously said.翻译:然而，不同消息来源此前曾表示，这一估值低于凯雷和 Trustar 曾一度寻求的高达 100 亿美元的估值，作为建立所谓持续基金的一部分。

A continuation fund is a type of investment vehicle created by private equity firms that enables them to more easily sell down their stakes in existing investments.翻译:延续基金是私募股权公司创建的一种投资工具，使他们能够更轻松地出售现有投资的股份。

The sources were not authorised to speak to media about the deal and declined to be identified. McDonald's declined to comment on the valuation figure. Carlyle also declined to comment.翻译:消息人士未获授权向媒体谈论该交易，因此拒绝透露姓名。麦当劳拒绝对估值数字发表评论。凯雷也拒绝置评。

Since 2017, the number of McDonald's stores in China has doubled to 5,500 and the country has become its second-largest market. The business aims to have more than 10,000 stores in China by 2028.翻译:自2017年以来，麦当劳在中国的门店数量翻了一番，达到5500家，中国已成为其第二大市场。该公司的目标是到2028年在中国拥有超过10,000家门店。

The business has also generated sales growth of more than 30% since September 2019, the company said in the statement.翻译:该公司在声明中表示，自 2019 年 9 月以来，该业务的销售额增长也超过 30%。

McDonald's made an unsolicited offer for Carlyle's stake in the China operations in recent weeks and the deal was struck quickly, said the sources.翻译:消息人士称，最近几周，麦当劳主动提出收购凯雷在中国业务中的股份，交易很快就达成了。

"Having a stronger investment position should give them a better voice in making sure that the growth that they expect out of that marketplace occurs," said Jim Sanderson, an analyst at Northcoast Research.翻译:Northcoast Research 分析师吉姆·桑德森 (Jim Sanderson) 表示：“拥有更强大的投资地位应该让他们在确保市场实现预期增长方面拥有更好的发言权。”

Reuters reported in August that Trustar Capital was planning to raise a continuation fund that would allow the Chinese private equity firm to sell down its stake in McDonald's China.翻译:路透社8月报道称，信星资本计划筹集一只延续基金，允许这家中国私募股权公司出售其在麦当劳中国的股份。

In contrast to McDonald's, U.S. meat and processed food maker Tyson Foods (TSN.N) plans to sell its China poultry business, sources have said.翻译:消息人士称，与麦当劳不同的是，美国肉类和加工食品制造商泰森食品(TSN.N) 计划出售其中国家禽业务。

British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser (RKT.L) in 2021 sold its China infant formula and child nutrition business to investment firm Primavera Capital for an enterprise value of $2.2 billion.翻译:英国消费品制造商利洁时（RKT.L）于2021年将其中国婴儿配方奶粉和儿童营养品业务以22亿美元的企业价值出售给投资公司春华资本。

item.title: 亚洲股市创两个月新高，美联储观点推动美元防御
item.description:
Asian shares climbed to fresh two-month highs on Tuesday, taking cues from a rally on Wall Street while the dollar languished near its lowest in two-and-a-half months on expectations the U.S. Federal Reserve is likely done with interest rate hikes.翻译:亚洲股市周二攀升至两个月新高，受到华尔街反弹的启发，而美元则因预期美联储可能结束加息而徘徊在两个半月以来的最低水平附近。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) was 0.97% higher at 510.11 having touched 511.05, the highest since Sept. 18. The index is up 7% for the month and on course for its biggest monthly gain since January.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)上涨 0.97%，至 510.11，触及 511.05，为 9 月 18 日以来的最高水平。该指数本月上涨 7%，有望创下 1 月份以来的最大月度涨幅。

With the economic calendar bare in Europe, the risk rally looks set to continue in European stock markets, with Eurostoxx 50 futures up 0.18%, German DAX futures 0.14% higher and FTSE futures up 0.01%.翻译:由于欧洲经济日历清淡，欧洲股市风险反弹似乎将持续，Eurostoxx 50 期货上涨 0.18%，德国 DAX 期货上涨 0.14%，富时指数期货上涨 0.01%。

Investor focus on Tuesday will firmly be on minutes of the Federal Reserve's last meeting to gauge which way rates are headed and also on earnings from Nvidia (NVDA.O), which hit a record high on Monday.翻译:周二投资者的焦点将集中在美联储上次会议纪要上，以衡量利率走向，以及英伟达(NVDA.O)的盈利，该公司周一创下历史新高。

On Monday, Wall Street's three major stock averages rose with Nasdaq's 1% rally leading the charge as heavyweight Microsoft (MSFT.O) hit a record high after it hired Sam Altman, who headed OpenAI until he was ousted late last week.翻译:周一，华尔街三大股指上涨，纳斯达克指数上涨 1%，重量级微软(MSFT.O)在聘请山姆·奥尔特曼 (Sam Altman) 后创下历史新高，山姆·奥尔特曼在上周末被赶下台之前领导 OpenAI。

Stock markets have broadly rebounded in November as a flurry of data that showed U.S. inflation might be easing has spurred bets that the Fed is done with monetary tightening and rate cuts may be on the way next year.翻译:11 月份股市普遍反弹，一系列数据显示美国通胀可能正在放缓，这引发了人们对美联储结束货币紧缩政策、明年可能会降息的押注。

Traders have nearly fully priced in the likelihood that the Fed will keep interest rates unchanged in December, and some have started pricing in rate cuts as soon as March, according to the CME Group's FedWatch tool.翻译:根据芝商所集团的 FedWatch 工具，交易员几乎已经完全消化了美联储将在 12 月维持利率不变的可能性，一些交易员最早已经开始在 3 月份降息。

Some remain cautious as economic data could change the monetary policy outlook.翻译:由于经济数据可能改变货币政策前景，一些人仍保持谨慎态度。

"It only takes another strong inflation print or more consumer/labour market strength, and rates would head higher again," said Ben Bennett, APAC investment strategist for Legal and General Investment Management.翻译:Legal and General Investment Management 亚太区投资策略师 Ben Bennett 表示：“只需要再次出现强劲的通胀数据或消费者/劳动力市场更加强劲，利率就会再次走高。”

"My main concern is ... that we'll see some disappointing data around the turn of the year, which will focus attention on the risk of recession."翻译:“我主要担心的是......我们将在今年年初看到一些令人失望的数据，这将使人们的注意力集中在经济衰退的风险上。”

Trading is expected to be muted for much of the week ahead of Thursday's U.S. Thanksgiving holiday and a sparse data calendar for the week.翻译:在周四的美国感恩节假期之前，预计本周大部分时间交易将会清淡，且本周数据稀少。

Nicholas Chia, Asia macro strategist at Standard Chartered, said there is also the adjacent risk that the last mile of getting inflation back to target may require a sharp increase in the unemployment rate in 2024, which can translate into more support for the dollar.翻译:渣打银行亚洲宏观策略师Nicholas Chia表示，还存在一个相邻的风险，即通胀回到目标的最后一英里可能需要2024年失业率大幅上升，这可能转化为对美元的更多支撑。

"Especially if recession fears grow, accompanied by murmurs of more tightening by the Fed."翻译:“特别是如果人们对经济衰退的担忧加剧，并伴有美联储进一步收紧政策的传言。”

In rest of Asia, Japan's Nikkei (.N225) edged higher and remained close to the 33-year high it toucehd on Monday. The index is up roughly 28% this year, making it the best performing stock market in Asia.翻译:在亚洲其他地区，日本日经指数(.N225)小幅走高，并仍接近周一触及的 33 年高点。该指数今年上涨了约 28%，成为亚洲表现最好的股市。

China's blue-chip CSI300 Index (.CSI300) was 0.58% higher, while Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index (.HSI) gained 078% as reports of Beijing's latest stimulus rollout for the property sector lifted risk appetite.翻译:中国蓝筹股沪深 300 指数(.CSI300)上涨 0.58%，而香港恒生指数(.HSI)上涨 078%，因有关北京最新推出房地产刺激措施的报道提振了风险偏好。

Treasury yields were lower in the wake of solid bidding in the $16-billion sale of 20-year Treasury bonds on Monday that suggested the market still anticipates inflation will decelerate and the Fed will cut rates next year.翻译:周一 160 亿美元的 20 年期国债发售后，国债收益率走低，这表明市场仍预计通胀将放缓，美联储明年将降息。

The yield on 10-year Treasury notes was down 2.9 basis points to 4.393%, while the yield on the 30-year Treasury bond was down 4.2 basis points to 4.533%.翻译:10年期国债收益率下跌2.9个基点至4.393%，30年期国债收益率下跌4.2个基点至4.533%。

Lower yields kept the dollar on the back foot, with the dollar index , which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of six major currencies, down 0.135% at 103.31, having touched near three month low of 103.17 earlier in the session.翻译:收益率下降使美元处于不利地位，衡量美元兑一篮子六种主要货币的美元指数下跌0.135%至103.31，盘中早些时候曾触及近三个月低点103.17。

The Japanese yen strengthened 0.22% to 148.03 per dollar, lifting away from the one-year low of 151.92 it touched last week.翻译:日元兑美元汇率上涨0.22%，至148.03日元，脱离上周触及的一年低点151.92日元。

The Australian dollar , often seen as a barometer of risk appetite, touched a three-month high of $0.65775 earlier in the session.翻译:通常被视为风险偏好晴雨表的澳元在盘中早些时候触及三个月高点0.65775美元。

The head of Australia's central bank said on Tuesday inflation will remain a crucial challenge over the next one to two years, in comments made two weeks after policymakers raised interest rates to a 12-year high earlier to tame high prices.翻译:澳大利亚央行行长周二表示，通胀仍将是未来一到两年的一个关键挑战，两周前政策制定者将利率提高至 12 年高点以抑制高物价。

Oil prices eased, reversing the previous day's rally. U.S. crude eased 0.46% to $77.47 per barrel and Brent was at $81.94, down 0.46% on the day.翻译:油价回落，扭转了前一天的涨势。美国原油下跌0.46%至每桶77.47美元，布伦特原油下跌0.46%至每桶81.94美元。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Lincoln Feast.翻译:安库尔·班纳吉报道；杰奎琳·王和林肯·费斯特编辑。

item.title: 缅甸向中国移交数千名电信诈骗嫌疑人
item.description:
Myanmar authorities have handed over 31,000 telecom fraud suspects to China since law enforcement officers from both countries launched a crackdown on online scams in September, Chinese authorities said on Tuesday.翻译:中国当局周二表示，自两国执法人员9月发起打击网络诈骗以来，缅甸当局已将31,000名电信诈骗嫌疑人移交给中国。

The suspects included 63 "financiers" and ring-leaders of crime syndicates that have cheated Chinese citizens of large sums of money, the Ministry of Public Security said in a statement.翻译:公安部在一份声明中称，犯罪嫌疑人包括63名“金融家”和犯罪集团头目，他们诈骗中国公民巨额资金。

"The crackdown has achieved significant battle results," the ministry said.翻译:公安部表示，此次打击行动取得了显著成效。

More than 100,000 people engage in telecom fraud each day in at least 1,000 scam centres in Myanmar, which shares a border with southwest China, Chinese state media has reported.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，与中国西南部接壤的缅甸，每天有超过 10 万人在至少 1,000 个诈骗中心从事电信诈骗。

Chinese police started to crack down on the fraud in September and this month, police launched what they said were "swift attacks" on crime gangs in Myanmar.翻译:中国警方从九月份开始打击诈骗活动，本月警方对缅甸的犯罪团伙发起了所谓的“迅速打击”。

The Myanmar ringleader of a gang committed suicide last week while on the run from Myanmar authorities, Chinese police said. Three members of his gang were later handed over to Chinese police.翻译:中国警方称，一名缅甸团伙头目上周在躲避缅甸当局追捕时自杀身亡。该团伙的三名成员后来被移交给中国警方。

With telecom scams in Myanmar targeting Chinese citizens surging, Assistant Foreign Minister Nong Rong visited Myanmar this month, saying China was ready to work with Myanmar on tackling cross-border crime including online gambling.翻译:随着缅甸针对中国公民的电信诈骗激增，外交部部长助理农融本月访问缅甸，表示中方已准备好与缅方合作打击包括网络赌博在内的跨境犯罪。

Nong also said China supported Myanmar in maintaining stability on their common border as Myanmar's junta battled insurgents in the area.翻译:农还表示，在缅甸军政府与该地区的叛乱分子作战之际，中国支持缅甸维护共同边界的稳定。

Myanmar's ruling military is facing attacks on multiple fronts in its borderlands as an alliance of ethnic minority insurgent groups combines with pro-democracy fighters to challenge the junta's rule.翻译:缅甸执政军队在边境地区面临多条战线的攻击，少数民族叛乱组织联盟与民主派战士联合起来挑战军政府的统治。

China has called for peace.翻译:中国呼吁和平。

"China has been playing a constructive role in its own way to promote peace talks and urge relevant parties to put the interests of the people first, cease fire and end war as soon as possible," a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Monday.翻译:外交部发言人周一表示：“中方一直以自己的方式发挥建设性作用，劝和促谈，敦促有关各方以人民利益为重，尽快停火止战。”

Reporting by Albee Zhang and Ryan Woo翻译:Albee 张和 Ryan Woo 报道

item.title: 人民币拖累美元跌至新低
item.description:
Summary:
  • Strong fix guides yuan higher; Asia follows
  • AUD, NZD, GBP and EUR make multi-month highs
  • Fed minutes due at 1900 GMT
翻译:概括：
  • 强势修复引导人民币走高；亚洲紧随其后
  • 澳元、纽元、英镑和欧元创数月新高
  • 美联储会议纪要将于 1900 GMT 发布

The dollar slipped to fresh milestone lows on the euro, yen and other major currencies on Tuesday, as China guided the yuan higher and its strength spurred broader softness for the dollar ahead of minutes from the Federal Reserve.翻译:周二，美元兑欧元、日元和其他主要货币跌至新的里程碑低点，原因是中国引导人民币走高，且在美联储会议纪要发布之前，人民币走强刺激美元整体走软。

China's central bank set the midpoint of the yuan's trading band at its strongest since Aug. 7. The yuan hit an almost four-month high of 7.1301 to the dollar in early trade.翻译:中国央行将人民币交易区间中点设定为8月7日以来的最高水平。人民币兑美元早盘触及近四个月高点7.1301。

The euro rose 0.2% to $1.0963, its highest since mid-August and the dollar was testing or breaking chart support on almost every major pair. The yen rose more than 0.5% to its strongest in seven weeks at 147.5 per dollar.翻译:欧元上涨0.2%至1.0963美元，为8月中旬以来的最高水平，美元正在测试或突破几乎所有主要货币对的图表支撑。日元汇率上涨逾 0.5%，至 1 美元兑 147.5 美元，创七周以来最高水平。

The New Zealand dollar broke through resistance around $0.6050 to trade 0.6% higher at a three-month high of $0.6072 by mid-session in Asia. The Australian dollar rose 0.4% with the tide to hit a three-month high of $0.6585.翻译:新西兰元兑美元在亚洲时段中期突破 0.6050 美元附近的阻力位，上涨 0.6%，至三个月高点 0.6072 美元。澳元兑美元大涨0.4%，触及三个月高点0.6585美元。

China's firm currency fixing came together with a Bloomberg News report on forthcoming support for the property sector which boosted stocks and the mood, said National Australia Bank strategist Rodrigo Catril in Sydney.翻译:澳大利亚国民银行(National Australia Bank)驻悉尼策略师罗德里戈·卡特里尔(Rodrigo Catril)表示，中国坚定的汇率定盘，加上彭博新闻社即将对房地产行业提供支持的报道，提振了股市和市场情绪。

"It's encouraging the market to think: 'OK, cool, we've seen the worst of CNY weakness,'" he said, using the currency's ticker. "They're telling us they want dollar/CNH lower."翻译:“这鼓励市场思考：‘好吧，酷，我们已经看到人民币疲软最严重的时候了，’”他用人民币的股票代码表示。 “他们告诉我们他们希望美元/离岸人民币走低。”

Bloomberg News reported Chinese regulators are drawing up a list of 50 developers eligible for funding, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博社援引知情人士的话报道称，中国监管机构正在起草一份有资格获得融资的 50 家开发商名单。

At the same time U.S. yields have fallen in anticipation that U.S. interest rates have peaked, the yen is showing signs of turning and the Aussie is riding an extra tailwind while prices for top export iron ore hit multi-year highs.翻译:与此同时，由于预期美国利率已见顶，美国收益率下跌，日元显示出转向迹象，澳元也乘势而上，而顶级出口铁矿石价格触及多年高点。

Minutes of Australia's November policy meeting showed that the central bank was concerned inflation expectations could become unmoored if it did not raise interest rates.翻译:澳大利亚11月政策会议纪要显示，央行担心如果不加息，通胀预期可能会失控。

The dollar index , which has fallen in seven of the past eight sessions, broke below its 200-day moving average on Monday and was down 0.2% at 103.2 on Tuesday, a 2-1/2-month low.翻译:美元指数在过去8个交易日中有7个交易日下跌，周一跌破200日移动均线，周二下跌0.2%至103.2，创2-1/2个月低点。

Sterling rose 0.3% to a two-month high of $1.2540. The Swiss franc hovered near its highest since early September. Trade in Scandinavian currencies tends to be light in Asia hours, but the Swedish crown hit a 3-1/2-month high and the Norwegian crown a two-month high.翻译:英镑上涨0.3%，至两个月高点1.2540美元。瑞士法郎徘徊在九月初以来的最高水平附近。亚洲时段，斯堪的纳维亚货币的交易往往清淡，但瑞典克朗触及 3-1/2 个月高点，挪威克朗触及两个月高点。

Markets have all but priced out the risk of a further U.S. rate hike in December or next year, and imply a 1-in-4 chance of an easing starting in March.翻译:市场几乎已经排除了美国在 12 月或明年进一步加息的风险，并暗示从 3 月份开始实施宽松政策的可能性为四分之一。

Fed minutes are due at 1900 GMT and headline the day ahead, along with a speech from European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde. Analysts caution that the dollar's downward momentum may not have too much further to run.翻译:美联储会议纪要将于格林尼治标准时间 1900 点发布，并于未来一天发布，欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德 (Christine Lagarde) 也将发表讲话。分析师警告称，美元的下行势头可能不会持续太久。

"I think there needs to be a reality check on the fact that the Fed's take on hawkish bias is not independent of where yields go," said Mizuho Bank's Asia head of economics, Vishnu Varathan.翻译:瑞穗银行亚洲经济主管 Vishnu Varathan 表示：“我认为需要对现实进行检验，即美联储对鹰派偏见的态度并不独立于收益率走势。”

"There will be a self-checking mechanism if yields fall too much," he said. "That means the dollar's fall might also be impeded, and it's premature to declare anything one way or another until we see the December (Fed meeting)."翻译:“如果收益率下降太多，将会有一个自我检查机制，”他说。 “这意味着美元的下跌也可能受到阻碍，在我们看到 12 月（美联储会议）之前以某种方式宣布任何事情还为时过早。”

Today's minutes, he said, might be significant if there are changes to the language around the bond market, particularly since bonds have rallied so hard since the Fed met at the end of last month.翻译:他表示，如果债券市场的措辞发生变化，今天的会议纪要可能意义重大，特别是自上个月末美联储会议以来债券大幅上涨。

Ten-year Treasury yields are down almost 50 basis points to 4.40% in November so far.翻译:11 月份迄今为止，十年期国债收益率已下跌近 50 个基点至 4.40%。

Asia's emerging market currencies (.MIMS00000CUS) also advanced to fresh highs, though focus will fall on Argentinian markets later in the day where domestic trade is set to resume after the election of libertarian Javier Milei as president.翻译:亚洲新兴市场货币(.MIMS00000CUS)也升至新高，不过当天晚些时候的焦点将集中在阿根廷市场，在自由主义者哈维尔·米雷 (Javier Milei) 当选总统后，国内贸易将恢复。

Reporting by Tom Westbrook; Editing by Jacqueline Wong翻译:汤姆·威斯布鲁克报道；编辑：黄杰奎琳

item.title: 领先者称台湾选举将选择是否拥抱中国
item.description:
Taiwan's people have to make a choice at next year's election about whether the island keeps moving forward on the road to democracy or "walks into the embrace of China", the frontrunner to be the next president said on Tuesday.翻译:下任总统的领跑者周二表示，台湾人民必须在明年的选举中做出选择，是继续走民主之路，还是“走进中国的怀抱”。

The issue of China, which claims Taiwan as its own territory, looms large ahead of the Jan. 13 presidential and parliamentary elections, especially as Beijing has been stepping up its military pressure against the island.翻译:在1月13日总统和议会选举之前，中国声称台湾是其领土，这一问题显得尤为突出，尤其是在北京加大对台湾军事压力的情况下。

Lai Ching-te, vice president and the ruling Democratic Progressive Party's (DPP) presidential candidate, has led in most opinion polls ahead of the election. The DPP champions Taiwan's separate identity from China.翻译:副总统、执政的民进党总统候选人赖清德在选举前的大多数民意调查中都处于领先地位。民进党主张台湾与中国的独立身份。

The largest opposition party, the Kuomintang (KMT), which traditionally favours close ties with Beijing, is locked in a dispute with the smaller Taiwan People's Party (TPP) about which of their candidates should run as president and which as vice president after initially agreeing to work together.翻译:传统上倾向于与北京保持密切关系的最大反对党国民党与规模较小的台湾人民党(TPP)陷入了争论，双方在最初同意后，谁应该竞选总统，谁应该竞选副总统。一起工作。

Speaking to reporters and supporters after formally registering his candidacy with the election commission, Lai said Taiwan's security was an international issue and the whole world was watching this election.翻译:黎智英在向选举委员会正式登记参选后对记者和支持者表示，台湾的安全是一个国际问题，全世界都在关注这次选举。

"The people of Taiwan have to choose between trusting Taiwan, allowing Taiwan to continue to move forward on the road of democracy, and relying on China, following the old path of the one-China principle, and walking into the embrace of China," he said.翻译:“台湾人民必须做出选择，要么信任台湾，让台湾继续在民主道路上前进，要么依赖中国，走一中原则的老路，走进中国的怀抱。”他说。

Beijing has demanded Taipei accepts both sides of the Taiwan Strait belong to "one China", which the DPP-led government has rejected saying only the island's people can decide their future.翻译:北京要求台北承认台湾海峡两岸属于“一个中国”，但民进党领导的政府拒绝了这一要求，称只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

Lai on Monday announced Taiwan's high profile former de facto ambassador the United States, Hsiao Bi-khim, as his running mate.翻译:赖智周一宣布台湾高调的前驻美国大使萧美琴为他的竞选搭档。

Like Lai, Hsiao is despised by China, which has twice placed sanctions on her, most recently in April, saying she was an "independence diehard".翻译:和黎智英一样，萧也受到中国的蔑视，中国已两次对她实施制裁，最近一次是在四月，称她是“独立顽固分子”。

Late on Monday, Chinese state television lambasted the Lai-Hsiao team up in a commentary on its website, saying they were "villains colluding together".翻译:周一晚间，中国国家电视台在其网站上发表评论，痛斥赖晓团队，称他们是“串通一气的恶棍”。

"Taiwan independence means war. The Lai-Hsiao independence double act will intensify cross-strait tensions and conflict," it said.翻译:台独就意味着战争，“丽萧独”双重行为将加剧两岸紧张和冲突。

Lai on Monday dismissed China's criticisms, saying it was further proof of Beijing's efforts to interfere in the election.翻译:赖周一驳回了中国的批评，称这进一步证明了北京试图干预选举。

Lai, standing next to Hsiao outside the election commission, said he was full of confidence.翻译:黎智英站在选举委员会外的萧身边，他表示自己充满信心。

"We both deeply love this land, passionately love this country," he added.翻译:“我们都深深热爱这片土地，热爱这个国家，”他补充道。

The election registration deadline is Friday. It remains unclear when the opposition will register their candidates.翻译:选举登记截止日期是周五。目前尚不清楚反对派何时登记其候选人。

Vincent Chou, campaign manager for the TPP's presidential candidate and party chairman Ko Wen-je, told reporters on Tuesday after further talks with the KMT it was "not an option" for them for Ko to be the running mate for the KMT's Hou Yu-ih.翻译:TPP 总统候选人兼党主席柯文哲的竞选经理周文哲 (Vincent Chou) 周二在与国民党进一步会谈后告诉记者，他们“没有选择”让柯文哲成为国民党侯瑜的竞选搭档。 ih.

"But if it's a Ko-Hou ticket, then everyone can work for this," Chou said.翻译:“但如果这是一张高厚票，那么每个人都可以为此努力，”周说。

Hou, speaking at a separate event, said he would "wait until the last moment" for Ko to make a decision on cooperation.翻译:侯在另一场活动中表示，他将“等到最后一刻”让柯做出合作决定。

item.title: 专家调查：中国碳排放量将于2030年达到峰值
item.description:
China is on track to meet a goal to bring its climate-warming carbon dioxide emissions to a peak before 2030, according to a poll of 89 experts from industry and academia published on Tuesday, though questions remain over how high the top will be.翻译:周二公布的一项由来自工业界和学术界的 89 名专家参与的民意调查显示，中国有望实现在 2030 年之前使导致气候变暖的二氧化碳排放量达到峰值的目标，但峰值到底有多高仍存在疑问。

More than 70% of respondents said China, the world's biggest carbon dioxide emitter, will be able to meet the target, with two saying its emissions had already peaked, in a poll compiled by the Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA), a Helsinki-based think tank.翻译:能源与清洁空气研究中心 (CREA) 编制的一项民意调查显示，超过 70% 的受访者表示，作为全球最大的二氧化碳排放国，中国将能够实现这一目标，其中两人表示其排放量已经达到峰值是一家总部位于赫尔辛基的智库。

Still, "experts remain concerned about how high the peak emissions would reach compared to previous levels," CREA said, with a majority of respondents expecting the total to be at least 15% higher than the 2020 level.翻译:尽管如此，CREA 表示，“专家们仍然担心峰值排放量与之前的水平相比会达到多高”，大多数受访者预计排放总量将比 2020 年的水平至少高出 15%。

Doubts have been cast on China's ability to meet its 2030 pledge, as authorities continue to approve dozens of new coal-fired power stations to meet rising energy demand and avoid a repeat of the disruptive power outages that hit the country in 2021.翻译:人们对中国是否有能力兑现 2030 年的承诺表示怀疑，因为当局继续批准数十个新的燃煤发电站，以满足不断增长的能源需求，并避免重蹈 2021 年发生的破坏性停电的覆辙。

But CREA said respondents, including 64 based in China, were more optimistic about the country's ability to meet its goal compared to last year, with the majority believing post-pandemic economic conditions were accelerating the energy transition.翻译:但 CREA 表示，与去年相比，包括 64 名中国受访者在内的受访者对中国实现目标的能力更加乐观，大多数人认为大流行后的经济状况正在加速能源转型。

Half of the experts surveyed by CREA said they believed China would reach peak primary energy consumption before the end of this decade, though nearly a quarter still forecast it would continue to rise even after 2035.翻译:CREA 调查的一半专家表示，他们相信中国的一次能源消费将在本十年结束前达到峰值，但近四分之一的专家仍预测，即使在 2035 年之后，中国一次能源消费仍将继续增长。

China's reluctance to agree to a phasing-out of fossil fuels is expected to be a major sticking point at COP28 climate talks in Dubai starting next week, though Beijing is willing to agree to a new global plan to triple renewable energy capacity.翻译:尽管北京愿意同意一项将可再生能源产能增加两倍的新全球计划，但中国不愿同意逐步淘汰化石燃料预计将成为下周在迪拜举行的第28届联合国气候变化框架公约(COP28)气候谈判的一个主要症结所在。

China also said in an agreement with the U.S. that it would "accelerate the substitution for coal, oil and gas generation" in order to secure "meaningful absolute power sector emission reductions" this decade.翻译:中国还在与美国的一项协议中表示，将“加速替代煤炭、石油和天然气发电”，以确保本十年“电力行业绝对减排量大幅减少”。

CREA's lead analyst Lauri Myllyvirta said last week it was likely China's emissions would go into a "structural decline" from next year, with renewable sources capable of meeting new energy demand.翻译:CREA首席分析师劳里·米利维尔塔(Lauri Myllyvirta)上周表示，从明年开始，中国的排放量可能会进入“结构性下降” ，可再生能源能够满足新能源需求。

(This story has been corrected to state that emissions likely 'would go into' a decline next year, not 'had already gone into' a decline, in paragraph 9)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，指出明年排放量可能“将进入”下降，而不是“已经进入”下降，第 9 段）

item.title: 中国混合动力汽车销量激增，对外国汽车制造商构成新的威胁
item.description:
As EV makers in China wage an intense price war to prop up slowing demand, Chinese brands with strong hybrid lineups are emerging as winners, attracting consumers with vehicles with long range that can cost less than gasoline cars.翻译:随着中国电动汽车制造商发动激烈的价格战以支撑不断放缓的需求，拥有强大混合动力产品线的中国品牌正在成为赢家，以比汽油车成本更低的长续航里程汽车吸引消费者。

The emerging trend may provide a glimmer of hope for global automakers such as Toyota (7203.T) and Honda who are pursuing "multi-pronged" electrification strategies, as electric vehicle (EV) sales lose momentum in Europe and the U.S., partly because of high auto financing costs.翻译:这一新兴趋势可能为丰田（7203.T）和本田等寻求“多管齐下”电气化战略的全球汽车制造商带来一线希望，因为电动汽车（EV）在欧洲和美国的销售失去动力，部分原因是汽车融资成本高。

One-third of total vehicle sales by Toyota, the world's top-selling automaker, are already hybrids and the company reported a 34% surge in hybrid sales in the six months to end-September, outpacing 9% growth in overall revenue.翻译:全球最畅销的汽车制造商丰田汽车总销量的三分之一已经是混合动力车，该公司报告称，截至 9 月底的六个月内，混合动力车销量猛增了 34%，超过了总收入 9% 的增幅。

Experts warn that foreign brands now face a growing threat from Chinese rivals that have conquered the domestic hybrid market and are looking overseas, emboldened by their strength as the world's lowest-cost EV producer after heavy investment in supply chains.翻译:专家警告说，外国品牌现在面临着来自中国竞争对手的日益增长的威胁，这些竞争对手已经征服了国内混合动力市场，并在对供应链进行了大量投资后，凭借作为全球成本最低的电动汽车生产商的实力，将目光投向海外。

In the United States, most hybrid powertrains sell at a $1,500 to $2,000 premium to combustion models, but in China, some hybrids are offered at a slight discount to gasoline models and can be as much as 23% cheaper than pure EVs.翻译:在美国，大多数混合动力总成的售价比内燃机车型高 1,500 至 2,000 美元，但在中国，一些混合动力车型的售价比汽油车型略有折扣，并且比纯电动汽车便宜 23%。

That price advantage is driving Chinese consumers to hybrid models, which work almost like pure EVs when they are used for short daily commutes, consuming little gasoline, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，这种价格优势正在促使中国消费者购买混合动力车型，这种车型在日常短途通勤时几乎与纯电动汽车一样，消耗的汽油很少。

"People are increasingly accepting that a car can be equipped with both an electric motor and a gasoline engine, as they are highly complementary," said Xu Min, a professor at Shanghai Jiao Tong University's Institute of Intelligent Vehicle. "Wherever the gasoline engine is low in efficiency, we can make up for it with the electric motor."翻译:上海交通大学智能汽车研究所教授徐敏表示：“人们越来越接受汽车可以同时配备电动机和汽油发动机，因为它们具有很强的互补性。” “凡是汽油机效率低的地方，我们都可以用电动机来弥补。”

Two types of hybrids – plug-in hybrid (PHEV) and extended-range hybrid (EREV) - are enjoying strong demand, with their combined shipments surging 85% and outpacing a 14% growth in pure electric car sales this year, industry data showed.翻译:行业数据显示，插电式混合动力汽车 (PHEV) 和增程式混合动力汽车 (EREV) 两种混合动力汽车的需求强劲，今年它们的总出货量猛增 85%，超过纯电动汽车销量 14% 的增幅。

The popularity of these hybrids is so strong that the segment is now half as big as the pure EV market and accounts for 12% of total passenger vehicle sales, according to data from China Association of Automobile Manufacturers (CAAM).翻译:根据中国汽车工业协会 (CAAM) 的数据，这些混合动力汽车非常受欢迎，目前该细分市场的规模是纯电动汽车市场的一半，占乘用车总销量的 12%。

Li Auto (2015.HK), the most popular extended-range hybrid seller in China, has thousands of customers waiting for delivery of its new large SUVs, a stark contrast with many other brands grappling with an unsold inventory buildup.翻译:理想汽车（2015.HK）是中国最受欢迎的增程式混合动力汽车销售商，有数千名客户等待其新款大型SUV的交付，这与许多其他品牌陷入未售出库存积压的情况形成鲜明对比。

"The extended-range hybrids are the best option for Chinese drivers who want ... a solution to driving range anxiety, better fuel efficiency, smarter driving features and lower prices," said Yale Zhang, managing director at the consultancy Automotive Foresight.翻译:咨询公司Automotive Foresight的董事总经理张耶鲁表示：“对于想要解决行驶里程焦虑、提高燃油效率、更智能的驾驶功能和更低的价格的中国驾驶员来说，增程式混合动力车是最佳选择。”

In the PHEV market, BYD has cemented its position as the most dominant player, with eight of the 10 top-selling plug-in hybrid cars in China among its offerings.翻译:在插电式混合动力汽车市场，比亚迪巩固了其主导地位，中国最畅销的 10 款插电式混合动力汽车中，比亚迪占据了 8 款。

A PHEV can be driven directly by the electric motor or the gasoline engine. An EREV has a larger battery pack and runs on electricity only, with its gasoline engine serving as a power bank to recharge the batteries when they run low.

CHINA THREAT

The growing popularity of PHEVs and EREVs from Chinese firms, which dominated the top 10 best-selling EREV or PHEV models, have not only affected sales of gasoline cars but also gasoline hybrid vehicles (HEV), a segment Toyota pioneered with the Prius in late 1990s.翻译:中国企业的 PHEV 和 EREV 日益普及，占据了最畅销 EREV 或 PHEV 车型前十名，这不仅影响了汽油车的销售，也影响了汽油混合动力汽车 (HEV) 的销量，后者是丰田最近通过普锐斯 (Prius) 开创的细分市场。 20 世纪 90 年代。

Sales of HEVs in China, which Toyota still dominates with four top-selling models, tumbled 15%, while gasoline car sales dropped 11%, underscoring potential challenges facing foreign automakers.翻译:丰田在中国仍以四款最畅销车型占据主导地位的混合动力汽车销量下降了 15%，而汽油车销量下降了 11%，凸显了外国汽车制造商面临的潜在挑战。

HEVs use gasoline for the main powertrain and come with a relatively small battery pack that is recharged during braking and used for auxiliary power. The sales slump for that type in China is partly a result of from government policy, which favours battery-driven hybrids by offering tax cuts for EVs, PHEVs and EREVs.翻译:混合动力汽车使用汽油作为主要动力系统，并配有相对较小的电池组，该电池组在制动过程中充电并用作辅助动力。中国此类车型销量下滑的部分原因是政府政策，该政策通过为电动汽车、插电式混合动力汽车和增程式电动汽车提供减税政策来支持电池驱动的混合动力汽车。

A foreign automaker was the first to crack the EREV market in China, only to cede it to local rivals: in 2017, General Motors (GM.N) launched the Buick Velite 5 as the first extended-range hybrid in China, two years before Li Auto started volume production.翻译:一家外国汽车制造商率先打入中国增程式电动车市场，结果却将其拱手让给了本土竞争对手：2017 年，通用汽车(GM.N)推出了别克 Velite 5，这是中国首款增程式混合动力车，两年前理想汽车开始量产。

But it was a failed trial, with sales of just over 4,000 units, and GM in 2020 halted sales. By contrast, Li Auto sold 244,225 EREVs in the first nine months of 2023.翻译:但这次尝试失败了，销量仅超过 4000 辆，通用汽车于 2020 年停止了销售。相比之下，理想汽车在 2023 年前 9 个月售出了 244,225 辆增程式电动车。

The struggle of the likes of GM and Toyota is a stark reminder of growing threats posed by Chinese rivals now looking to export markets for growth.翻译:通用汽车和丰田等公司的困境清楚地提醒人们，现在寻求出口市场寻求增长的中国竞争对手所构成的威胁越来越大。

BYD is expanding PHEV sales overseas, offering Han, Qin and Song lineups in Latin America, which has less charging infrastructure.翻译:比亚迪正在扩大插电式混合动力汽车的海外销售，在充电基础设施较少的拉丁美洲提供汉、秦和宋系列产品。

Stellantis (STLAM.MI) is investing $1.6 billion in Leapmotor and is interested in bringing the Chinese partner’s EREV hybrids to Europe, according to people with knowledge of the matter.翻译:据知情人士透露，Stellantis (STLAM.MI)正在向零跑汽车投资 16 亿美元，并有兴趣将中国合作伙伴的 EREV 混合动力车引入欧洲。

Stellantis told Reuters it does not exclude the possibility of cooperation with Leapmotor on new energy technology products. Leapmotor did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:Stellantis向路透社表示，不排除与零跑汽车在新能源技术产品上进行合作的可能性。零跑汽车没有回应置评请求。

Xu at Jiao Tong University, however, noted that the difference in driver demands across markets could affect demand for Chinese cars.翻译:然而，交通大学的徐指出，不同市场驾驶员需求的差异可能会影响对中国汽车的需求。

In North America, for example, consumers would look for cars with bigger horsepower to tow trailers, enabling a bigger popularity for HEVs.翻译:例如，在北美，消费者会寻找马力更大的汽车来牵引拖车，从而使混合动力汽车更加普及。

Still some are sceptical of the HEV's longer-term future.翻译:但仍有一些人对混合动力汽车的长期未来持怀疑态度。

"Conventional hybrid (HEV) is breathing life into a dying patient - the gasoline engine," said Bill Russo, CEO of Shanghai-based advisory firm Automobility.翻译:上海咨询公司 Automobility 首席执行官比尔·拉索 (Bill Russo) 表示：“传统混合动力 (HEV) 正在为垂死的病人——汽油发动机注入生命。”

Reporting by Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh; Editing by Miyoung Kim and Gerry Doyle翻译:张岩、Brenda Goh 报道；编辑：Miyoung Kim 和 Gerry Doyle

item.title: 早盘竞价：日经指数在突破之际反弹
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets from Alden Bentley, U.S. Breaking News Editor for Finance and Markets.翻译:美国财经与市场突发新闻编辑奥尔登·本特利 (Alden Bentley) 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。

A question for Asia traders on Tuesday looks to be: Does the Nikkei (.N225) have the oomph to reclaim the three-decade high set Monday before profit taking kicked in, amid a reluctance to overextend before market liquidity dries up for the holidays at the end of the week.翻译:周二亚洲交易员面临的一个问题似乎是：日经指数(.N225)是否有能力在获利回吐开始之前收复周一创下的三年高点，因为在假期期间市场流动性枯竭之前不愿过度扩张。周末。

The rise of the benchmark Japanese share index to its highest intraday level since March 1990 on Monday crowned an 8% rally so far this month and the Nikkei is on track for its heftiest monthly gain in three years thanks to strong earnings and offshore demand.翻译:日本基准股指周一升至 1990 年 3 月以来的最高盘中水平，本月迄今已上涨 8%，得益于强劲的盈利和离岸需求，日经指数有望创下三年来的最大月度涨幅。

Meanwhile, the resurgent yen in U.S. trade firmed to a 6-1/2-week high against the dollar at 148.10 after last week's rally pulled dollar/yen down to its lowest since early October.翻译:与此同时，在上周的反弹将美元/日元拉至10月初以来的最低点之后，美国贸易中的日元兑美元汇率复苏，升至6-1/2周高点148.10。

Chinese blue chips .CSI300 eked out a 0.2% gain as the country's central bank held rates steady as expected, but set a firm fix for the yuan that saw the dollar slip under 7.2000 CNY=CFXS to a three-month low. It stayed soft during U.S. trading, where it last was quoted midmorning at 7.1680 yuan.翻译:由于中国央行如预期维持利率稳定，中国蓝筹股.CSI300微涨0.2%，但对人民币设定了坚定的定盘价，导致美元跌破7.2000 CNY=CFXS，跌至三个月低点。在美国交易期间，其最后报价为人民币 7.1680 元。

Asia awakens to another solid advance on Wall Street, notably tech stocks and a record high for Microsoft after CEO Satya Nadella said OpenAI chief Sam Altman is set to join the company to lead a new advanced AI research team.翻译:在首席执行官萨蒂亚·纳德拉 (Satya Nadella) 表示 OpenAI 首席执行官萨姆·奥尔特曼 (Sam Altman) 将加入该公司领导一个新的先进人工智能研究团队后，亚洲市场迎来了华尔街的又一次强劲上涨，尤其是科技股和微软创历史新高。

On Friday, the main U.S. stock indexes posted gains for the third week in a row as evidence of easing U.S. inflation supported bets that the Fed was done raising interest rates.翻译:周五，美国主要股指连续第三周上涨，因美国通胀放缓的证据支持了美联储不再加息的押注。

The benchmark S&P 500 (.SPX) is now less than 2% away from its highest level this year that was reached in July. Treasury yields ticked lower on a solid 20-year note auction and anticipation that inflation will decelerate allowing the Fed to cut interest rates next year.翻译:基准标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)目前距离 7 月份达到的今年最高水平不到 2%。由于 20 年期国债拍卖强劲，且预期通胀将放缓，美联储明年将降息，美国国债收益率小幅走低。

There are few potential U.S. market moving events this week, besides Tuesday's day early release of the minutes from the Federal Open Market Committee's last meeting.翻译:除了周二提前发布的联邦公开市场委员会上次会议纪要外，本周美国市场几乎没有什么潜在的影响事件。

U.S. markets are closed Thursday for Thanksgiving and Friday stocks and bonds will trade abbreviated sessions. Exchanges will also be closed in Japan on Thursday.翻译:美国市场周四因感恩节休市，周五股票和债券交易时段将缩短。日本的交易所也将于周四休市。

Later in the week the Reserve Bank of Australia releases minutes of its Nov. 7 policy meeting and Bank Indonesia is expected to keep its key interest rate on hold at 6.00%. Japan releases consumer price data on Friday, arguably the data highlight for the week.翻译:本周晚些时候，澳大利亚储备银行将发布 11 月 7 日政策会议纪要，预计印度尼西亚央行将维持 6.00% 的关键利率不变。日本周五将发布消费者价格数据，可以说是本周的数据亮点。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Tuesday:翻译:以下是可能为周二市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- FOMC Minutes翻译:- 联邦公开市场委员会会议纪要

- Chinese Q3 earnings: Baidu.com, iQiyi, Kingsoft Cloud, Kuaishou Technology, Tongcheng Travel Holdings翻译:- 中国第三季度财报：百度、爱奇艺、金山云、快手科技、同程旅游控股

item.title: 习近平告诉马克龙，中国希望法国企业增加投资
item.description:
China wants more French companies to invest in the country and hopes France will provide a fair business environment for Chinese firms, President Xi Jinping said on Monday, while France also called for fair rules for foreign companies in China.翻译:习近平主席周一表示，中国希望更多法国企业来华投资，希望法国为中国企业提供公平的营商环境，法国也呼吁为在华外国企业提供公平的规则。

Xi made the comments in a phone call with French President Emmanuel Macron, Chinese state television reported, seeking to strengthen ties with its European trading partner after Macron visited China in April.翻译:据中国国家电视台报道，习近平在与法国总统马克龙的电话中发表了上述言论，寻求在马克龙四月份访问中国后加强与欧洲贸易伙伴的关系。

China faces an electric vehicle subsidy investigation by the European Union and a looming probe into its steelmakers. Meanwhile, several European countries have complained about China's opaque laws and rules regarding foreign companies in the country.翻译:中国面临欧盟的电动汽车补贴调查以及即将对其钢铁制造商进行的调查。与此同时，一些欧洲国家抱怨中国针对在华外国公司的不透明法律和规定。

"China is willing to maintain high-level exchanges with the French side," Xi said, adding that he welcomed more French products entering the Chinese market.翻译:中方愿同法方保持高层交往，欢迎更多法国产品进入中国市场。

Macron's office said the opening of the Chinese market should go hand-in-hand with fair competition rules for foreign companies.翻译:马克龙办公室表示，中国市场的开放应与外国企业的公平竞争规则齐头并进。

Asked whether France had made progress to counter Chinese plans to force French cosmetics companies to share manufacturing secrets with Chinese parties, a French presidential adviser said it was a major issue that Macron had raised himself.翻译:当被问及法国是否在应对中国强迫法国化妆品公司与中方分享制造机密的计划方面取得进展时，法国总统顾问表示，这是马克龙自己提出的一个重大问题。

"It's an important point for us, considering what's at stake for French companies," the adviser said.翻译:这位顾问表示：“考虑到法国公司面临的利害关系，这对我们来说很重要。”

Macron's office also said China had joined a French initiative called "Buildings Breakthrough" that sets a zero carbon emissions goal for the building sector for 2030.翻译:马克龙办公室还表示，中国已加入法国一项名为“建筑突破”的倡议，该倡议为建筑行业设定了2030年零碳排放的目标。

Xi also said China was willing to strengthen cooperation with France at the United Nations and other multilateral institutions. China took over the presidency of the U.N. Security Council (UNSC) this month.翻译:习近平还表示，中方愿同法方加强在联合国等多边机构中的合作。中国本月接任联合国安理会主席。

The leader of the world's second-largest economy also called on France to play a constructive role in promoting the positive development of China-EU relations, as ties have been strained over issues ranging from the EU's push to reduce supply chain reliance on China to the war in Ukraine.翻译:这位世界第二大经济体的领导人还呼吁法国在推动中欧关系积极发展方面发挥建设性作用，因为中欧关系因欧盟推动减少供应链对中国的依赖等问题而变得紧张。乌克兰战争。

"China and the European Union should remain partners for mutually beneficial cooperation," Xi said in the call.翻译:习近平在通话中表示，“中国和欧盟要继续做互利合作的伙伴”。

The two leaders also exchanged views on the conflict in Gaza, and agreed that it was imperative to avoid a further deterioration of the situation, in particular an even more serious humanitarian crisis, state television reported.翻译:据国家电视台报道，两位领导人还就加沙冲突交换了意见，一致认为必须避免局势进一步恶化，特别是避免更加严重的人道主义危机。

The French presidential adviser said China, as a member of the UN Security Council, should contribute more to UNRWA, the UN Palestinian refugee agency than the $1 million it currently gives every year.翻译:法国总统顾问表示，作为联合国安理会成员，中国应该向联合国巴勒斯坦难民机构近东救济工程处提供比目前每年100万美元更多的捐款。

"We encourage the Chinese authorities to do much more," the adviser said.翻译:“我们鼓励中国当局做更多的事情，”这位顾问说。

Reporting by Ethan Wang and Bernard Orr in Beijing, Michel Rose in Paris; Editing by Toby Chopra and Alex Richardson翻译:Ethan Wang 和 Bernard Orr 在北京报道，Michel Rose 在巴黎报道；托比·乔普拉和亚历克斯·理查森编辑

item.title: 美国财长耶伦称 TikTok 问题仍未解决
item.description:
The United States has concerns about issues over privacy and social media, and the matter involving TikTok is not yet resolved, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen told CNBC in an interview on Monday.翻译:美国财长耶伦周一在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，美国对隐私和社交媒体问题感到担忧，涉及 TikTok 的问题尚未解决。

Yellen declined to discuss details involving the short video platform owned by Chinese parent company ByteDance, citing pending legal action that prevents U.S. regulators from acting.翻译:耶伦拒绝讨论涉及中国母公司字节跳动旗下短视频平台的细节，理由是悬而未决的法律行动阻止美国监管机构采取行动。

"We do have concerns around the potential issues with privacy and social media," she said, adding that she cannot discuss TikTok specifically. "This is a matter that has not yet been resolved."翻译:“我们确实对隐私和社交媒体的潜在问题感到担忧，”她说，并补充说她无法具体讨论 TikTok。 “这是一个尚未解决的问题。”

"This wasn't an explicit matter of discussion" between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping when they met last week, Yellen told CNBC.翻译:耶伦对 CNBC 表示，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平上周会面时“并没有明确讨论这件事”。

She said she discussed Chinese investments in the United States with her Chinese counterpart during their own meeting, including the process involving the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS).翻译:她说，她在自己的会议上与中国同行讨论了中国在美国的投资，包括涉及美国外国投资委员会（CFIUS）的程序。

CFIUS is an interagency committee, chaired by the Department of Treasury, which reviews foreign investments in U.S. businesses and real estate that implicate national security concerns.翻译:CFIUS 是一个跨机构委员会，由财政部担任主席，负责审查涉及国家安全问题的外国对美国企业和房地产的投资。

Yellen added that both the Washington and Beijing recognize that they have the opportunity to work together after the presidents' met last week.翻译:耶伦补充说，华盛顿和北京都认识到，在上周两国元首会晤后，他们有机会合作。

Reporting by Doina Chiacu and Susan Heavey; Editing by Toby Chopra and Doina Chiacu翻译:Doina Chiacu 和 Susan Heavey 的报道；托比·乔普拉 (Toby Chopra) 和多伊纳·恰库 (Doina Chiacu) 编辑

item.title: 小米第三季度净利润因成本节省而大幅增长，收入增加
item.description:
Smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp (1810.HK) posted a forecast-beating jump in third-quarter net income on Monday, while revenue also topped estimates as flat device shipments outperformed the wider market.翻译:智能手机制造商小米公司（1810.HK）周一公布第三季度净利润增长超预期，而由于平板设备出货量跑赢大盘，营收也超出预期。

The company's sales for the period totalled 70.9 billion yuan ($9.83 billion), beating an average estimate of 70.2 billion yuan from 13 analysts polled by LSEG.翻译:该公司当期销售额总计 709 亿元人民币（合 98.3 亿美元），超过 LSEG 调查的 13 名分析师平均预期的 702 亿元人民币。

Net income jumped by 183% from a year earlier to 6 billion yuan thanks to lower component costs and efficiencies across the business, compared to a consensus estimate of 4.6 billion yuan.翻译:由于零部件成本降低和整个业务效率提高，净利润较上年同期跃升 183% 至 60 亿元人民币，而市场普遍预期为 46 亿元人民币。

"While we did not encounter many positive external factors, the achievements we were still able to make demonstrate an improvement in our overall capabilities," Xiaomi President Lu Weibing said on an earnings call.翻译:小米总裁卢伟冰在财报电话会议上表示：“虽然我们没有遇到太多积极的外部因素，但我们仍然能够取得的成绩表明我们整体能力的提高。”

Xiaomi, China's fifth-largest smartphone brand, shipped 9.1 million devices in China during the latest quarter, according to industry research firm Canalys.翻译:根据行业研究公司 Canalys 的数据，中国第五大智能手机品牌小米最近一个季度在中国的设备出货量为 910 万部。

Though that was little changed from a year earlier, Xiaomi outperformed peers, with overall industry sales dropping 5% year on year, according to Canalys.翻译:Canalys 的数据显示，尽管与去年同期相比变化不大，但小米的表现优于同行，行业整体销售额同比下降 5%。

Demand in the world's biggest smartphone market has long been in decline, with the COVID-19 pandemic and then a weak economy persuading customers to wait longer before upgrading their phones.翻译:全球最大智能手机市场的需求长期以来一直在下降，原因是新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行以及随后的经济疲软迫使客户在升级手机之前等待更长时间。

But there have long some signs of recovery, including Xiaomi's sales of more than 1 million units of its latest flagship smartphone in the week since its launch.翻译:但长期以来已经出现了一些复苏的迹象，包括小米最新旗舰智能手机自推出以来的一周内销量超过 100 万部。

Xiaomi investors are also focused on signs of progress for its new electric vehicle division.翻译:小米投资者还关注其新电动汽车部门的进展迹象。

Last week, a unit of Beijing-based automaker BAIC Group applied to regulators for approval to manufacture two electric vehicle models under the Xiaomi brand name in a sign that production may start soon.翻译:上周，北京汽车制造商北汽集团旗下子公司向监管机构申请批准生产两款小米品牌电动汽车，这表明生产可能很快就会开始。

Xiaomi's Lu reaffirmed its goal of mass producing vehicles in the first half of 2024 during the earnings call and signalled continued investment in the vehicle business, with car-related R&D personnel reaching 3,000 by the end of September.翻译:小米集团董事长卢勇在财报电话会议上重申了2024年上半年量产汽车的目标，并表示将继续投资汽车业务，到9月底汽车相关研发人员将达到3000人。

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

item.title: 中国重申支持新国家加入金砖国家，阿根廷表示拒绝
item.description:
China reaffirmed its support on Monday for new countries joining the BRICS grouping of developing nations, even as Argentina's likely next foreign minister was quoted as saying that her country would no longer do so.翻译:中国周一重申支持新国家加入金砖国家集团，尽管阿根廷可能的下一任外交部长表示，她的国家将不再这样做。

Argentina was among six countries invited to become new members of the BRICS at a summit held in South Africa in August, part of the grouping's push to reshuffle a Western-dominated world order it sees as outdated.翻译:8月在南非举行的一次峰会上，阿根廷是受邀成为金砖国家新成员的六个国家之一，这是金砖国家推动重新洗牌其认为已经过时的西方主导世界秩序的一部分。

However, Russia's RIA news agency cited Diana Mondino, an economist tipped to become foreign minister in the administration of Argentina's newly-elected Javier Milei, as saying that her country would not now join the BRICS group.翻译:然而，俄罗斯通讯社援引经济学家戴安娜·蒙迪诺的话称，阿根廷现在不会加入金砖国家。蒙迪诺有望成为阿根廷新当选的哈维尔·米莱政府的外交部长。

Mao Ning, a Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson, told a press briefing that she was not aware of Mondino's reported comments.翻译:中国外交部发言人毛宁在新闻发布会上表示，她不了解蒙迪诺的言论报道。

"What I want to say is that the BRICS cooperation mechanism is an important platform for emerging markets and developing countries to strengthen solidarity and cooperation and uphold common interests," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“我想说的是，金砖国家合作机制是新兴市场国家和发展中国家加强团结合作、维护共同利益的重要平台。”

"BRICS is also an open platform and we welcome any interested country to become a member of the BRICS family."翻译:“金砖国家也是一个开放的平台，我们欢迎任何有兴趣的国家成为金砖国家大家庭的一员。”

Milei, a right-wing libertarian who has sharply criticised China and the China-led BRICS group, was elected Argentina's new president on Sunday.翻译:曾尖锐批评中国和中国领导的金砖国家的右翼自由主义者米雷周日当选阿根廷新总统。

Milei and Mondino had both opposed Argentina joining the bloc, which also includes Brazil, Russia, India and South Africa.翻译:米莱和蒙迪诺都反对阿根廷加入该集团，该集团还包括巴西、俄罗斯、印度和南非。

"We don't understand what the benefit (of joining BRICS) is for Argentina at the moment. If it later turns out that there is a benefit, we will analyze it," she told the RIA news agency.翻译:“我们目前不明白（加入金砖国家）对阿根廷有什么好处。如果后来证明有好处，我们会分析它，”她告诉俄新社。

China and Russia are pushing for the expansion of the BRICS grouping as they seek to counter Western economic dominance.翻译:中国和俄罗斯正在推动金砖国家集团的扩张，以对抗西方的经济主导地位。

Saudi Arabia, Iran, Ethiopia, Egypt and the United Arab Emirates are the other five countries invited at the August summit to join the BRICS grouping.翻译:沙特阿拉伯、伊朗、埃塞俄比亚、埃及和阿拉伯联合酋长国是八月份峰会上受邀加入金砖国家集团的另外五个国家。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Ethan Wang Editing by Gareth Jones翻译:Liz Lee 和 Ethan Wang 报道 Gareth Jones 编辑

item.title: 尽管经济不利，汇丰仍有望实现中国财富招聘目标
item.description:
HSBC (HSBA.L) is on track to meet a target of expanding its China wealth business headcount to 3,000 by 2025, despite the country's current economic headwinds, as it bets on a steadily rising number of the extremely affluent, a senior executive said.翻译:汇丰银行(HSBA.L)一位高级管理人员表示，尽管中国目前面临经济逆风，但汇丰银行 (HSBA.L) 仍有望实现到 2025 年将其中国财富业务员工人数扩大到 3,000 人的目标，因为该行押注于极度富裕人群的数量稳步增长。

The Asia-focused bank has recruited around 1,500 wealth managers in the world's second-largest economy since 2021, Trista Sun, HSBC China head of wealth and personal banking, told Reuters.翻译:汇丰银行中国财富及个人银行业务主管孙翠斯塔 (Trista Sun) 告诉路透社，自 2021 年以来，这家专注于亚洲的银行已在全球第二大经济体招募了约 1,500 名财富经理。

The expansion of the China wealth advisory team serves HSBC's digital-focused "Pinnacle" strategy, part of a pivot towards Asia with $3.5 billion worth of investments committed to the region in 2021.翻译:中国财富咨询团队的扩张服务于汇丰银行以数字化为重点的“Pinnacle”战略，这是汇丰银行转向亚洲战略的一部分，汇丰银行承诺于 2021 年向该地区投资 35 亿美元。

The growing headcount is in addition to wealth advisory staff in HSBC's Chinese branches, Sun said. Most foreign banks still rely on in-branch wealth planners to serve clients in China.翻译:孙说，除了汇丰银行中国分行的财富顾问人员之外，员工人数也在不断增加。大多数外资银行仍然依赖分行内的理财规划师为中国客户提供服务。

HSBC is pressing ahead with the hiring plan as China's wealth and insurance sector is expanding faster than the country's economy is expected to, she added.翻译:她补充说，由于中国财富和保险业的扩张速度快于该国经济的预期，汇丰银行正在推进招聘计划。

The bank estimates that China's household wealth will increase by around 8.5% a year over a five-year period starting 2022, outpacing Beijing's around-5% annual target for 2023 economic growth which many fear will be a struggle to reach.翻译:该银行估计，从 2022 年开始的五年内，中国家庭财富将每年增长 8.5% 左右，超过北京设定的 2023 年经济增长 5% 左右的年度目标，许多人担心这一目标将难以实现。

Under Pinnacle, HSBC runs an insurance brokerage unit which in September became the first qualified foreign-owned broker to distribute mutual funds locally.翻译:汇丰银行在 Pinnacle 旗下运营着一个保险经纪部门，该部门于 9 月成为第一家在当地分销共同基金的合格外资经纪商。

The bank's targeted wealth clientele - adults with a net worth of at least $250,000 - is expected to double to 350 million by 2030 in China, the bank estimates.翻译:该银行估计，到 2030 年，该银行的目标财富客户（净资产至少为 25 万美元的成年人）预计将在中国翻一番，达到 3.5 亿。

A weaker Chinese yuan has bolstered demand for offshore investment options, with Sun pointing to the quota-based Qualified Domestic Institutional Investors programme (QDII) and Wealth Management Connect scheme covering China's wealthy Greater Bay Area as investors seek "exposure to the international market".翻译:人民币贬值提振了对离岸投资选择的需求，孙指出，随着投资者寻求“接触国际市场”，基于配额的合格境内机构投资者计划（QDII）和覆盖中国富裕的大湾区的理财通计划。

The London-headquartered bank has expanded its QDII offer with the acquisition of Citigroup's (C.N) China consumer wealth management business in October this year, Sun said.翻译:孙表示，这家总部位于伦敦的银行今年 10 月收购了花旗集团的中国消费者财富管理业务，扩大了 QDII 业务。

item.title: 国际货币基金组织、中国准备与阿根廷新任领导人米莱合作
item.description:
Kristalina Georgieva, head of the International Monetary Fund, and a spokesperson for China's foreign ministry said on Monday they were ready to work with Argentina's president-elect Javier Milei.翻译:国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔利娜·格奥尔基耶娃和中国外交部发言人周一表示，他们准备与阿根廷当选总统哈维尔·米莱合作。

Argentina elected right-wing libertarian Javier Milei as its new president on Sunday, rolling the dice on an outsider with radical views to fix an economy battered by triple-digit inflation, a looming recession and rising poverty.翻译:阿根廷周日选举右翼自由主义者哈维尔·米莱为新任总统，将赌注押在了一位持激进观点的局外人身上，以修复遭受三位数通胀、迫在眉睫的衰退和贫困加剧打击的经济。

The IMF has a $44 billion loan program with Argentina.翻译:国际货币基金组织与阿根廷有 440 亿美元的贷款计划。

"We look forward to working closely with (Milei) and his administration in the period ahead to develop and implement a strong plan to safeguard macroeconomic stability and strengthen inclusive growth for all," Georgieva said in a post on X.翻译:格奥尔基耶娃在 X 上发表的一篇文章中表示：“我们期待在未来一段时间内与（米莱）及其政府密切合作，制定和实施一项强有力的计划，以维护宏观经济稳定并加强所有人的包容性增长。”

China, another key lender to Argentina, also congratulated the South American country on its election.翻译:阿根廷的另一个主要贷款国中国也祝贺这个南美国家的当选。

"We stand ready to work with the Argentine side to continue our friendship, boost our respective development and revitalization with win-win cooperation, and promote the steady and long-term development of China-Argentina relations," foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told a regular press briefing.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁表示，我们愿同阿方一道，续写友谊，以合作共赢助力各自发展振兴，推动中阿关系行稳致远。定期举行新闻发布会。

Reporting by Karin Strohecker and Liz Lee in Beijing; editing by Marc Jones and Mark Heinrich翻译:Karin Strohecker 和 Liz Lee 北京报道；马克·琼斯和马克·海因里希编辑

Chairman of the State Duma of the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation, Vyacheslav Volodin, will lead a delegation to China from Nov. 21 to 23, Chinese state media reported on Monday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周一报道，俄罗斯联邦会议国家杜马主席维亚切斯拉夫·沃洛金将于11月21日至23日率团访问中国。
